message: Hello Bob, I have an amazing product that I think you'll really love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we compromise at $105?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $100, and I'll throw in a bonus for you?
